## Methods

### `Protected`checkStatus

  * checkStatus(data: any): void

Checks the status of data and throws an error if there's a problem.

#### Parameters

    * data: any

External reference to the data to check

#### Returns void

#### Throws

InworldError if the data contains an error status

Inherited from Node.checkStatus
